alert.note: Alert for Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 30 at 3:04AM EST until December 01 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts between 40 and 50 mph shifting to the west. A few gusts up to 55 mph possible. * WHERE...Northern Worcester MA, Southern Worcester MA and Northern Middlesex MA Counties. * WHEN...Strongest of these winds will come in two rounds. The first roughly between 3 and 9 pm this evening. The second between 9 am and 5 pm Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Southern Worcester
